name: LivinupHOME
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn on the comfort mode”
”Alexa, turn on the romantic mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa for control your home lighting such as kitchen light, bathroom light, curtain...etc. When you sleepy, just ask Alexa to turn off all light. you won't standup to find wall switch. just ask Alexa!

The skill need to work with Livinup smart home controller. and support 6 scenes lighting control, help/panic button, security, curtain...etc.
